mapper.sql: SNO, ORDER_NO, MERCHANT_TRANX_REF_NO, AMOUNT, CAN, TERMINAL_RND_NO, CARD_RND_NO, DEBIT_CMD, TERMINAL_SESSION_KEY, RECIEPT_SESSION_KEY, TERMINAL_COUNTER, HOST_COUNTER, RECIEPT_DATA, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, MERCHANT_NO, HOST_REF_NO, PURSE_DATA, TRANXLOGID, DEBIT_SESSION_KEY, EZLINK_STRING, DECRYPTED_RECIEPT_DATA, DECRYPT_RECEIPT_STATUS
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_ETERMINAL_DATA.nextval from dual
insert into EZLINK.ETERMINAL_DATA (SNO, ORDER_NO, MERCHANT_TRANX_REF_NO, AMOUNT, CAN, TERMINAL_RND_NO, CARD_RND_NO, DEBIT_CMD, TERMINAL_SESSION_KEY, RECIEPT_SESSION_KEY, TERMINAL_COUNTER, HOST_COUNTER, RECIEPT_DATA, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, MERCHANT_NO, HOST_REF_NO, PURSE_DATA, TRANXLOGID, DEBIT_SESSION_KEY, EZLINK_STRING, DECRYPTED_RECIEPT_DATA, DECRYPT_RECEIPT_STATUS ) values (#{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantTranxRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{can,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalRndNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardRndNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debitCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recieptSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalCounter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hostCounter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recieptData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{purseData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tranxlogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debitSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ezLinkString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decryptedRecieptData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decryptReceiptStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update EZLINK.ETERMINAL_DATA
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_TRANX_REF_NO = #{merchantTranxRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CAN = #{can,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_RND_NO = #{terminalRndNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_RND_NO = #{cardRndNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEBIT_CMD = #{debitCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_SESSION_KEY = #{terminalSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECIEPT_SESSION_KEY = #{recieptSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_COUNTER = #{terminalCounter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOST_COUNTER = #{hostCounter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECIEPT_DATA = #{recieptData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PURSE_DATA = #{purseData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DECRYPTED_RECIEPT_DATA = #{decryptedRecieptData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DECRYPT_RECEIPT_STATUS = #{decryptReceiptStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SNO = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update EZLINK.ETERMINAL_DATA set ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_TRANX_REF_NO = #{merchantTranxRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CAN = #{can,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_RND_NO = #{terminalRndNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_RND_NO = #{cardRndNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEBIT_CMD = #{debitCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_SESSION_KEY = #{terminalSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIEPT_SESSION_KEY = #{recieptSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_COUNTER = #{terminalCounter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOST_COUNTER = #{hostCounter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECIEPT_DATA = #{recieptData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOST_REF_NO = #{hostRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURSE_DATA = #{purseData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANXLOGID = #{tranxlogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEBIT_SESSION_KEY = #{debitSessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EZLINK_STRING = #{ezLinkString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DECRYPTED_RECIEPT_DATA = #{decryptedRecieptData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DECRYPT_RECEIPT_STATUS = #{decryptReceiptStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where SNO = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
